trends: There have been no other sightings in Fantom
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsGood afternoon, apologize for my invasion. I already sent you letter, on which was not an answer, but it was written in russian language. I have to You offer on count of Your exploratory work. There is much factors which will help to find the answers to Your questions. About you I have heard the event from telecast. Has Solved to contact and try to co-operate. My name to You nothing will not give, but that where I work You much intresting. I show the agent of the russian special services. This speaks of many thing, since I know much that, in than you need. But I too need your help. All questions and details shall write on Your return letter. RESPECTFULLY YOURS FANTOM. E-mail: paxan555@list.ru
